# Hypervisor Structures | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Hypervisor ](/documentation/hypervisor)

- [ Hypervisor Structures ](/documentation/Hypervisor/hypervisor-structures)

-  Hypervisor Structures 

API Collection# Hypervisor Structures

## [Overview](/documentation/Hypervisor/hypervisor-structures#Overview)

These structures allow you to interact with or control specific aspects of the operation of the Hypervisor.

## [Topics](/documentation/Hypervisor/hypervisor-structures#topics)

### [Structures](/documentation/Hypervisor/hypervisor-structures#Structures)

[`struct hv_cache_type_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_cache_type_t)The structure that describes an instruction or data cache element.[`struct hv_vcpu_exit_exception_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_vcpu_exit_exception_t)The structure that describes information about an exit from the virtual CPU (vCPU) to the host.[`struct hv_apic_ctrl_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_apic_ctrl_t)[`struct hv_apic_intr_trigger_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_apic_intr_trigger_t)[`struct hv_apic_lvt_flavor_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_apic_lvt_flavor_t)[`struct hv_apic_state`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_apic_state)[`struct hv_apic_state_ext_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_apic_state_ext_t)[`struct hv_atpic_state`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_atpic_state)[`struct hv_atpic_state_ext_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_atpic_state_ext_t)[`struct hv_gic_distributor_reg_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_gic_distributor_reg_t)[`struct hv_gic_icc_reg_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_gic_icc_reg_t)[`struct hv_gic_ich_reg_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_gic_ich_reg_t)[`struct hv_gic_icv_reg_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_gic_icv_reg_t)[`struct hv_gic_intid_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_gic_intid_t)[`struct hv_gic_msi_reg_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_gic_msi_reg_t)[`struct hv_gic_redistributor_reg_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_gic_redistributor_reg_t)[`struct hv_ioapic_state`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_ioapic_state)[`struct hv_ioapic_state_ext_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_ioapic_state_ext_t)[`struct hv_sme_p_reg_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_sme_p_reg_t)[`struct hv_sme_z_reg_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_sme_z_reg_t)[`struct hv_vcpu_sme_state_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_vcpu_sme_state_t)[`struct hv_vm_exitinfo_t`](/documentation/hypervisor/hv_vm_exitinfo_t)## [See Also](/documentation/Hypervisor/hypervisor-structures#see-also)
